    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(CardType type,
            int key)
        Parameters:
        type -
        key - is a random number of the card, it should be 0-15 for chance and 0-16 for community

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Draw card function generate random value and draw a card

      • invalidKey

        public boolean invalidKey()
        Returns:
        true if it is invalid key and false if it is valid key

      • value

        public int value()
        Returns:
        value of the card (money)

      • travel

        public int travel()
        Returns:
        number of step that you can move, it can be negative number

      • travelTo

        public int travelTo()
        Returns:
        a number which represent for tile on the board, it should be from 0-40

      • travelRail

        public boolean travelRail()
        Returns:
        true if the card asks to move to the nearest rail, false for the opposite case.

      • house

        public int house()
        Returns:
        the money that you have to pay for a house

      • hotel

        public int hotel()
        Returns:
        the money that you have to pay for a hotel

      • eachPlayer

        public int eachPlayer()
        Returns:
        the money that you have to pay for a every single player

      • isPaid

        public boolean isPaid()
        Returns:
        true if player has to pay for the owner or can buy from the bank if it's unowned, false for the opposite case.

      • outJailFree

        public boolean outJailFree()
        Returns:
        true if you got Jail Free card, false for the opposite case.

      • type

        public CardType type()
        Returns:
        type of the card, it should be CHANCE or COMMUNITY

      • action

        public CardAction action()
        Returns:
        action of the card, it should be BANK_MONEY,PLAYER_MONEY, MOVE, MOVE_TO, MOVE_NEAREST, REPAIR, GET_OUT_JAIL

      • execute

        public Player execute(Player player)
        execute action of the on the player
        Parameters:
        player - object in play
        Returns:
        updated player it should be BANK_MONEY,PLAYER_MONEY, MOVE, MOVE_TO, MOVE_NEAREST, REPAIR, GET_OUT_JAIL
